messageBody:
Hi,

Rather than explain, I'll let the test case speak for itself:

public class CastToTestTest extends TestCase {
// Simple concrete extension of BaseTestRunner
private final class BaseTestRunnerExtension
extends BaseTestRunner
{
protected void runFailed(String message) {}
public void testEnded(String testName) {}
public void testFailed(int status, Test test, Throwable t) {}
public void testStarted(String testName) {}
}

public static class Example implements junit.framework.Test {
public int countTestCases() {return 0;}

public void run(TestResult result) {}

public static Test suite() {
TestSuite result= new TestSuite();
result.addTest(new Example());
return result;
}
}

public void testRunTestWhichIsNotATestCase() {
Test myTest = new BaseTestRunnerExtension()
.getTest(Example.class.getName());

// This fails using JUnit 4.4:
assertNotNull(myTest);
assertTrue(myTest instanceof TestSuite);
}
}

- Bruno
